title: Project Hoodie Redeem Buttom
body:
I was about to purchase the hoodie when my computer went blue screen and turned off, so I went on my phone to purchase it. But when I got on, it said in the Quests that I had redeemed it already. I checked my orders and it said no orders were placed, does this mean I can no longer purchase the jacket?

Edit: It isn't in my shopping bag either.
Edit: It now shows up in my orders, but it is cancelled, still says "Redeemed" in the quests.

replies.body: Hey.. Same thing happen to me.... Sent a ticket . Take them forever support team to reply .. I don't want to lose the hoodie limited edition

I looked into this for you, but I was unable to determine that the quest was completed.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can look into this further to figure out what's going on.  Thank for your patience!
